question: Hi , my Question is simple ; I been feeling a burning sensation and warm feeling in my fingertips like if just my fingertips r hot and burning like if i was cutting chilis spices and they get a little red i can feel it just liket hat and more if i touch something ,just wondering what can it be ....somebody told me i may have diabetes but want more opinions ,to see if i really need to go to the doc or not .....thanks so much and hope somebody can help me ....my first time here....
title: Weird Sensation
